wikipedia_page.main: John Lang (16 August 1881 – 1 September 1934) was a Scottish footballer who played as an outside right. Born in Kilbirnie, in North Ayrshire, Scotland, he spent the majority of his career in England where he played for Barnsley, Sheffield United and Leicester Fosse in The Football League.
